name: Less-parser-air
body:
# LESS Parser Air (the fork)

This is a fork of the Less Parser app by [@FilipVT] (http://twitter.com/FilipVT), which you can download from [www.proving-ground.be/less](http://www.proving-ground.be/less/).

Since I haven't built the AIR app installer yet, I use the original version and copy my modified files into the install folder.

Once I learn how to create an AIR app, I may add the installer, but I don't want to infringe on the original creator's work.
tagline: The Less Parser in Adobe Air monitors less files for changes and automatically compiles them into regular css files
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
